rules.description: Remap section sign (§) from British Keyboard to US's backtick + plus minus (±) to tilde (~)
PC-Style Screenshot (PrintScreen for whole, Shift+PrintScreen to select)
left control + left shift + ` (backtick) - launches a new iTerm2 window with the default profile

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "iTerm2"' -e 'create window with default profile' -e activate -e end

rules.description: Use Backspace as Go to Previous Folder
Use Option + Number to Switch Tabs in Chrome & Firefox
Use Delete as Move to Trash
